name: Ojamadification
desc: Reveal 1 LIGHT Machine Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and banish any number of "Ojama" monsters from your hand, field, and/or GY; Special Summon from your hand, Deck, and/or GY, Fusion Materials with different names specifically listed on the revealed card, equal to the number of monsters banished this way. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 3 of your banished "Ojama" monsters; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
